subject: Sales
title: Good Cop, Bad Cop
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Good Cop, Bad Cop.

hook.text: One negotiator is harsh and demanding. The other is friendly and 'on your side.' Classic setup.

buildup.text: Good cop/bad cop creates emotional contrast. Relief from the nice one makes you concede.

discovery.text: Police interrogators perfected it. Corporate negotiation teams adapted it for boardrooms.

twist.text: The counter is simple: call it out. Once the tactic is named, it loses all its power.

climax.text: Even knowing the trick doesn't fully protect you. Emotional contrast bypasses logic every time.

punchline.text: The friendly one is always the dangerous one.

quiz.question: How do you counter good cop/bad cop?
options: Only talk to the bad cop
